title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Mount Alexander
other_title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Mt Alexander
abstract: Interviews with residents from the region of Mount Alexander in Victoria, made as part of the 'ACMI in the Regions' program.
description: The 'ACMI in the Regions' program aims to encourage regional storytelling on-screen and to equip local participants with the knowledge, confidence and skills to practice - long into the future - the art and craft of the moving image.  We adopt a community cultural development approach to our work in regional areas. Actively engaging local residents in the process of storytelling and film production, we facilitate participation that helps people to document their histories and capture their own stories - to express and explore on-screen why they live and work and play in the towns they call home.  This program contains nine stories about residents from around the Mount Alexander region in Central Victoria. Covering the towns of Castlemaine, Newstead and Maldon, locals tell stories about their lives and their connection to the land and the community.
